Package it.polimi.ingsw.networking

Class ServerConnectionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.networking.ServerConnectionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pingable, Loggable, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ServerRMIConnectionHandler, ServerSocketConnectionHandler
    public abstract class ServerConnectionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements Loggable, Pingable, java.io.Serializable
    Abstract superclass of Server's connectionHandlers for both RMI and Socket connections.
    Author:
    Stefano Formicola
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
